short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earn points for opening new tabs and use them to support climate-beneficial services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ClimateClicker is an extension designed to promote environmental awareness and action through everyday browsing activities. Users earn points for opening new tabs, which they can redeem to support various climate-beneficial services such as cleaning oceans, offsetting CO2 emissions, and planting trees. The extension replaces the default new tab page with a custom page with a points counter, redemption options, and shortcuts to frequently visited websites. he extension displays ads in the new tab page, which help finance these environmental initiatives.
